skill_comment: Decreases 11.2% of DEF on all the short-ranged units in the opposing Formation.
Increases 5.0% of ATK, HEA and REP on all Light side units in the Formation.
Increases ATK, HEA, REP, DEF, ACC, and EVA by 5.0% for the three Light side units in front of and diagonally in front of this Unit.
Increases 20.0% of ACC on all the Ewok units in the Formation.
Increases 10.0% of DEF on all the Jedi units in the Formation.
Increases 10.0% of ATK, HEA and REP on all the Droid units in the Formation.
Increases 5.0% of DEF on all the short-ranged units in the Formation.
Decreases 5.0% of DEF on all Light side units in the opposing Formation.
Increases 14.5% of EVA on all the Droid units in the Formation.
Increases 10.0% of DEF on all the Droid units in the Formation.
A high probability of increasing this Unit's own ATK, DEF, ACC, and EVA by 5.1% for that turn.
Decreases 16.8% of ACC on all Light side units in the opposing Formation.
Reduces the effectiveness of all (DOWN/UP) Skills on the opposing formation by 16.1%
Increases 6.1% of DEF on all Dark side units in the Formation.
Chance to reflect blaster attacks (109.1% of the original attack) to attacker for that turn.
Decreases 14.0% of EVA on all the Droid units in the opposing Formation.

Chance to increase this unit's DEF by 100.0% for that turn.

Increases 10.0% of ACC on all the medium-ranged units in the Formation.

Absorbs 12.9% of ATK and DEF from Dark side and Neutral Units adjacent (L/R) to this Card. The Units adjacent to this Card receive a decrease of 12.9% to their ATK and DEF. (In the event that a Unit is adjacent to two Units bearing this Skill, this Skill's effect will overlap, resulting in a consecutive decrease of the Unit's ATK and DEF.)
Increases ATK, HEA, REP, DEF, ACC, and EVA by 5.4% for the three Dark side units in front of and diagonally in front of this Unit.
Chance to increase this unit's DEF by 50.0% for that turn.
Increases 11.5% of DEF on all the Galactic Empire units in the Formation.
Chance to reflect blaster attacks (83.0% of the original attack) to attacker for that turn.
Decreases 11.5% of EVA on all the units in the opposing Formation.
Increases 14.8% of ATK on all the long-ranged units in the Formation.
Increases 5.4% of ATK, HEA and REP on all Dark side units in the Formation.
Increases ATK, HEA, and REP by 7.2% for the three Jabba's Crime Syndicate units in front of and diagonally in front of this Unit.
Decreases 10.0% of DEF on all the Male units in the opposing Formation.
Decreases 10.0% of DEF on all the Droid units in the opposing Formation.
Increases 10.0% of EVA on all Light side units in the Formation.
A small chance to increase this unit's ATK by 50.0% for that turn.
A small chance to increase this unit's ATK by 50.0% for that turn.

Earns ATK and/or DEF boosts from certain Light side and Neutral Units. The ATK/DEF boost will be equally divided from 1.1% of the sum of the differences between this Unit's ATK/DEF and the ATK/DEF of only Light/Neutral Unit(s) in the formation, bearing ATK/DEF LOWER than this Unit.
A high probability of increasing this Unit's own ATK, DEF, ACC, and EVA by 5.5% for that turn.
A small chance to reflect blaster attacks (80.5% of the original attack) to attacker for that turn.
Decreases 9.4% of ATK, HEA and REP on all the units in the opposing Formation.

Reduces the effectiveness of all (DOWN/UP) Skills on the opposing formation by 20.1%
Decreases 5.0% of DEF on all the long-ranged units in the opposing Formation.
